queries.query: select count(t1.p1) as v1 from (select distinct(p.patient_hid) as p1 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id =  ':pncGivenWithin48HoursUUID:' and o.value = 'true' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:') as t1, (select distinct(p.patient_hid) as p2 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id =  ':newBornCareUuid:' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:') as t2 where t1.p1 = t2.p2;

select count(distinct(p.patient_hid)) as v1 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id =  ':newBornCareUuid:' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:';

select count(*) as v1 from medication m join patient p on m.patient_hid = p.patient_hid join encounter e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where m.drug_id=':pentaThreeDrugUuid:' and ((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramStartDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramStartDate:')) <= 23) or (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramEndDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramEndDate:')) <= 23)) and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:';

select count(*) as v1 from observation o join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where o.concept_id =  ':newBornCareUuid:' and ((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramStartDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramStartDate:')) <= 23) or (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramEndDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramEndDate:')) <= 23)) and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:';

select count(t1.p1) as v1 from (select distinct(p.patient_hid) as p1, o.datetime as d1 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id = ':pncNumberUuid:' and date(o.datetime) between date(':paramStartDate:') and date(':paramEndDate:')) as t1, (select distinct(p.patient_hid) as p2, o.datetime as d2 from patient p join observation o on p.patient_hid = o.patient_hid join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where p.gender = 'F' and o.concept_id = 'fe65e1b2-5203-11e5-ae36-005056820c09' and date(o.datetime) between date(DATE_SUB(date(':paramStartDate:'), interval 2 day)) and date(':paramEndDate:') and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:') as t2 where t1.p1 = t2.p2 and time_to_sec(timediff(t1.d1, t2.d2 )) / 3600 < 48;
